tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  LOTS OF HOMEWORK  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: Took this class online. She\'s really helpful and all of the assignments are clearly written out at the beginning of the semester. It\'s a work-at-your-own-pace kind of class and then it\'s easier than taking online. Would definitely recommend.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: It looks like she is better as an on-line instructor. Test were hard. Take someone else if you can if it is a class room setting.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I took the Accounting online class and although the subject itself is hard she is very helpful and makes it easy. We had discussions which were an easy 100 as long as you know what you\'re talking about & don\'t have many grammatical errors. The homework is not that hard & you get two attempts to take the quizzes.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Took her online course, but she was still great! She outlined the entire course in advance and listed for you step by step your weekly tasks. Accounting isn\'t easy but she is very helpful!

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Great teacher, and funny in a way. If you listen to her lecture and ask questions you will be fine. One of the best professors ever!!

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Excellent teacher! The course is difficult, but she does a great job explaining it. Do all the practice problems because many of them will be on the test. I would recommend Professor Cissel to anybody!

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Absolutely a wonderful teacher for individual tax. She is very entertaining and likes to joke around. Even though she gives curves, you need to study for her exams. Very problem oriented.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Great teacher. Do the homework .. It helps & is graded.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Very involved with homework manager. Do the homework, it helps a lot with the tests (even with the block testing). We went over the homework in class. Ask questions if you need to, she will answer them! Overall a great class.
